docs.snippet: LEAD: It is probably by chance rather than an attempt to shock us with yesterday's sensations that three of opera history's most celebrated events will be paid homage this week on New York stages. The Metropolitan unveils its new production of Str...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: It is probably by chance rather than an attempt to shock us with yesterday's sensations that three of opera history's most celebrated events will be paid homage this week on New York stages. The Metropolitan unveils its new production of Strauss' ''Salome'' tomorrow evening, the Philadelphia Orchestra offers a concert version of Verdi's ''Nabucco'' at Carnegie Hall the same night, and on Saturday, also at Carnegie, Herbert von Karajan and the Vienna Philharmonic present Act I of Wagner's ''Tristan und Isolde.

headline.main: The Cult of Original Genius Is Our Curse

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: The Bush Administration was caught off guard by the agreement by five Central American countries to disarm the Nicaraguan guerrillas, American officials said today, even though Secretary of State James A. Baker 3d met with the Foreign Ministers of Costa Rica and Honduras just last week.

docs.snippet: LEAD: By forcing anti-Sandinista rebels out of their Honduran base camps in return for free elections in Nicaragua, a meeting of Central American presidents has brought the focus of the region's peace process back where it started: the battle over...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: By forcing anti-Sandinista rebels out of their Honduran base camps in return for free elections in Nicaragua, a meeting of Central American presidents has brought the focus of the region's peace process back where it started: the battle over the future of Nicaragua.

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: rrSid the Doorman was home watching the N.B.A. All-Star Game Sunday afternoon when he soon began having great difficulty staying awake. At first he thought he might be coming down with some terrible jungle sleeping sickness, or maybe it was the early hours he was keeping.
